query.sql: UPDATE ITEM_DATA SET STATUS_ID=?, VALUE=?,UPDATE_ID=? WHERE ITEM_DATA_ID=?

query.name: deleteDn

query.name: updateStatusByEventCRF
query.sql: UPDATE item_data SET status_id=? WHERE event_crf_id=? and status_id != 5

query.name: findAllBySectionIdAndEventCRFId
query.sql: SELECT d.* FROM item_data d, item_form_metadata m WHERE d.item_id = m.item_id AND m.section_id = ? AND d.event_crf_id=? order by d.ordinal

query.name: findByCRFVersion
query.sql: SELECT d.* FROM item_data d, versioning_map vm WHERE d.item_id = vm.item_id AND vm.crf_version_id = ? order by d.event_crf_id , d.item_id

query.name: findAllActiveBySectionIdAndEventCRFId
query.sql: SELECT d.* FROM item_data d, item_form_metadata m WHERE d.item_id = m.item_id AND m.section_id = ? AND d.event_crf_id=? and d.status_id != 5 and d.status_id != 7 order by d.ordinal

query.name: findByItemIdAndEventCRFId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM item_data WHERE item_id=? AND event_crf_id = ? Order by item_data.ordinal asc

query.name: findMinMaxDates
query.sql: select min(date_created) as min_date, max(date_created) as max_date from item_data

query.name: findAllByEventCRFId
query.sql: select * from item_data where event_crf_id=?

query.name: findAllByEventCRFIdAndItemId
query.sql: select * from item_data where event_crf_id=? and item_id = ? and status_id!=5 and status_id!=7 Order by item_data.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllByEventCRFIdAndItemIdNoStatus
query.sql: select * from item_data where event_crf_id=? and item_id = ? Order by item_data.ordinal asc

query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: select currval('item_data_item_data_id_seq') as key

query.name: getNextPK
query.sql: select nextval('item_data_item_data_id_seq') as key

query.name: findAllByEventCRFIdAndItemName
query.sql: select id.* from item_data id, item i where id.event_crf_id=? and id.item_id = i.item_id and (i.name = ?)

query.name: findAllBlankRequiredByEventCRFId
query.sql: select id.* from item_data id, item i, item_form_metadata ifm where id.event_crf_id=? and id.item_id = i.item_id and i.item_id = ifm.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id=? and ifm.required=true and ifm.show_item=true and (id.value='')

query.name: findAllRequiredByEventCRFId
query.sql: select distinct id.* from item_data id, item_form_metadata ifm where id.event_crf_id=? and id.item_id = ifm.item_id and ifm.show_item=true and ifm.required=true

query.name: getMaxOrdinalForGroup
query.sql: SELECT max(id.ordinal) AS max_ord FROM item_data id, item_group_metadata igm, item_form_metadata ifm WHERE id.event_crf_id=? AND ifm.section_id=? And igm.item_group_id=? And id.item_id = igm.item_id And id.item_id = ifm.item_id

query.name: getMaxOrdinalForGroupByGroupOID
query.sql: SELECT max(ordinal) AS max_ord FROM item_data where event_crf_id = ? and item_id in (select item_id from item_group_metadata where item_group_id in ( select item_group_id from item_group where oc_oid=?));

query.name: getMaxOrdinalForGroupByItemAndEventCrf
query.sql: select max(ordinal) AS max_ord from item_data where item_id = ? and event_crf_id = ?

query.name: findByItemIdAndEventCRFIdAndOrdinal
query.sql: SELECT * FROM item_data WHERE item_id=? AND event_crf_id = ? And item_data.ordinal=? Order by item_data.ordinal asc

query.name: getGroupSize
query.sql: SELECT count(*) From item_data id WHERE id.item_id = ? and id.event_crf_id = ? and id.status_id!=5 and id.status_id!=7

query.name: findByStudyEventAndOIDs
query.sql: select distinct item_data.* from event_crf left outer join study_event on event_crf.study_event_id= study_event.study_event_id left outer join item_data on item_data.event_crf_id=event_crf.event_crf_id left outer join item on item_data.item_id=item.item_id left outer join item_group_metadata on item_group_metadata.item_id=item.item_id left outer join item_group on item_group_metadata.item_group_id=item_group.item_group_id where event_crf.study_event_id=? and item.oc_oid= ? and item_group.oc_oid=? and item_data.status_id != ? and item_data.status_id != ? order by item_data.item_data_id asc

query.name: findValuesByItemOID
query.sql: select value from item it, item_data id where it.oc_oid = ? and it.item_id = id.item_id and id.value != ''

query.name: updateStatus
query.sql: UPDATE item_data SET status_id=? WHERE item_data_id=?

query.name: findAllByEventCRFIdAndItemGroupId
query.sql: select id.* from item_data id join item i on id.item_id = i.item_id join event_crf ec on id.event_crf_id=ec.event_crf_id join item_group_metadata igm on i.item_id=igm.item_id and igm.crf_version_id = ec.crf_version_id where id.event_crf_id = ? and igm.item_group_id = ? order by id.ordinal, igm.ordinal

query.name: isItemExists
query.sql: select item_data_id from item_data where item_id=? and ordinal=? AND event_crf_id = ?
